author: TravisEz13
body: add codeowner file to automatically assign reviewers and to describe who owns areas.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Travis CI temporary failed - I restarted it.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
> +test/                                              `@JamesWTruher` `@TravisEz13` `@adityapatwardhan`

Just realized that this cause Jim, Travis and Aditya to be dragged into almost every PR review.
Maybe we shouldn't specify 'test/' in the codeowner file.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Rules later in the file are supposed to override previous rules.  Let's see how it actually works before we change it.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: But looking at least one PR it looks like it takes the aggregate of what it finds from the rules.  Do you want me to submit a PR removing the area-test rule?

title: Add codeowner files
